RuleSet.Name: src/Schema/SchemaSchema.java
RuleSet.Descr: Java JPA implementation of a $SchemaName$ schema.

GenFile.Name: fileSchemaSchemaJava
GenFile.BasePackageName: $reference ManufacturingSchema lower JavaPackage$.$reference ManufacturingSchema lower SchemaName$/src/main/java
GenFile.SubPackageName: $reference ManufacturingSchema lower JavaPackage$.$reference ManufacturingSchema lower SchemaName$

RuleSet.GenRule: $switch HasDefSchema yes empty default reallyImplSchemaParseEnum$
$implSchemaParseEnumParse$$implSchemaParseEnumOrdinal$
newMap.put( "$Name$", $popto EnumDef Name$.$Name$ );
newMap.put( Integer.valueOf( $popto EnumDef Name$.$Name$.ordinal() ), $popto EnumDef Name$.$Name$ );
, I$reference RefSchema SchemaName$Schema

$implSchemaSchemaConstructor$$implSchemaGetCFTipClientHandler$$iterate SchemaRefs( first implSchemaConfigurationFileAccessors each empty empty implSchemaConfigurationFileAccessors )$$implSchemaAuthorizationAccessors$$iterate SchemaRefs( first implSchemaJndiNameAccessors each empty empty implSchemaJndiNameAccessors )$$iterate SchemaRefs( first implSchemaConnectionMethods each empty empty implSchemaConnectionMethods )$$iterate SchemaRefs( first implSchemaNewSchema each empty empty implSchemaNewSchema )$$iterate SchemaRefs( first implSchemaFileImport each empty empty implSchemaFileImport )$$iterate Id16Generators( each implNextIdGen empty empty)$$iterate Id32Generators( each implNextIdGen empty empty)$$iterate Id64Generators( each implNextIdGen empty empty)$$iterate UuidGenerators( each implNextIdGen empty empty )$$iterate SchemaTables( each implTableMethods empty empty )$
$reference RefSchema implSchemaReleasePreparedStatements$
$reference RefSchema implSchemaSchemaGetSetDbSchemaNameMethods$
$reference RefSchema implSchemaCommitControl$
protected I$DefSchemaName$$TableName$Table table$TableName$;
protected I$DefSchemaName$$TableName$Factory factory$TableName$;
$implSchemaTableTableAccessors$$implSchemaTableFactoryAccessors$
$popto SchemaDef implSchemaAuthorizationAccessors$
$reference RefSchema implSchemaFileImport$
$reference RefSchema implSchemaNewSchema$
$reference RefSchema implSchemaConnectionMethods$
$reference RefSchema implSchemaConfigurationFileAccessors$
table$TableName$ = null;
factory$TableName$ = new $SchemaName$$TableName$DefaultFactory();
